description: A traditional hand guard with a simple design. It is durable and provides a reliable grip without any unnecessary weight or bulk. This hand guard is ideal for those who prefer a more classic look for their weapon.
A hand guard designed for tactical use. It features a rugged, textured design that provides a non-slip grip, even in wet conditions.

A lightweight hand guard designed to reduce overall weight and improve weapon handling. It is made from lightweight materials such as plastic and aluminum and features a minimalist design that eliminates excess weight and bulk.
A heavy forward grip that provides excellent stability and control. Its weight can be tiring over extended periods of use, but its benefits in accuracy cannot be denied.

A light forward grip that provides decent control without adding much weight to the weapon. It is not as stable as heavier grips but can be useful in situations where speed and agility are more important.
An ergonomic forward grip that is designed to fit the natural contours of the human hand. It provides good control and comfort during extended use.
